participant_1.background:
I am of a healthy weight for my height.
i enjoy building computers.
i am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.
I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.

participant_2.background:
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
i like to eat.
I had to rebuild my comic book collection after it was stolen.
i own a pug , and he s the most loyal pet you ll ever have.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.

content.text: I enjoy bowling but I also like to collect comic books.
That is so interesting! I've always wanted to try bowling.
If you ever come to my small town in the midwest I would be happy to take you bowling.
That would be so much fun! I love meeting new people and learning new things.
Me too! I am an artist and I love to travel. I find new inspiration in different places.
I love to travel too! I have been to Europe and I would love to go back.
Europe is so beautiful! I have only been to Paris and I would love to see more of it.
Have you ever been to London? I hear it is amazing.
I have not! But it is definitely on my list of places to visit.
I'm sure you would love it there! It's a very historic city.
It sounds amazing! I can't wait to visit one day.
I am sure you will have a great time!
